title: How to use PhonePe in my PC - Quora

response.answer_text: Use phonepe in PC:- There is much application by using of that u can install phonepe in your laptop/computer like buzzstack, software informer but once I used in a laptop it's not working like that after that I remove the app from a laptop and use from mobile Send Money From PhonePe to Bank Account? Install PhonePe in your phoneNow register with your number and other detail in your PhonePe.Now there is an option Tap on My Money.After that tap on Wallets/ Gift Voucher.Now select the PhonePe Wallet.After that tap on Withdrawal.A screen will appear that shows Your withdrawal Balance.Now your balance will be credited to your linked bank accountIts very easy as simple as that

How To Send Money From PhonePe to Bank Account? Just follow the below steps to send money from PhonePe wallet to Bank Account. Launch PhonePe in your phone make sure that you have logged in your PhonePe wallet.Now Tap on My Money.Next tap on Wallets/ gift Voucher.Now select the PhonePe Wallet.After that tap on Withdrawal.A screen will appear that shows Your withdrawal Balance. To withdraw your amount slide down to your Bank Symbol.After sliding your balance will be credited to your linked bank account within 1-2 minutes.
